headline: Amgen Agrees to Buy Dark Blue Therapeutics in Up to $840 Million Deal
summary: The acquisition adds a preclinical protein degrader program targeting acute myeloid leukemia to Amgen's oncology pipeline.

raw.headline: Amgen Agrees to Buy Dark Blue Therapeutics in Up to $840 Million Deal
raw.summary: The acquisition adds a preclinical protein degrader program targeting acute myeloid leukemia to Amgen's oncology pipeline.

headline: Dark Blue Therapeutics acquired by Amgen for up to $840 million
summary: Dark Blue Therapeutics ("Dark Blue"), a discovery and development biotech company pioneering the next generation of precision oncology medicines, has been acquired by Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN).

raw.headline: Dark Blue Therapeutics acquired by Amgen for up to $840 million
raw.summary: Dark Blue Therapeutics ("Dark Blue"), a discovery and development biotech company pioneering the next generation of precision oncology medicines, has been acquired by Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN).

headline: AMGEN ACQUIRES DARK BLUE THERAPEUTICS, BOLSTERING ONCOLOGY PIPELINE
summary: Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN) today announced its acquisition of Dark Blue Therapeutics Ltd., a privately held biotechnology company based in the United Kingdom advancing first-in-class, small molecule-targeted protein degraders for oncology, in a transaction valued at up to $840 million.

raw.headline: AMGEN ACQUIRES DARK BLUE THERAPEUTICS, BOLSTERING ONCOLOGY PIPELINE
raw.summary: Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN) today announced its acquisition of Dark Blue Therapeutics Ltd., a privately held biotechnology company based in the United Kingdom advancing first-in-class, small molecule-targeted protein degraders for oncology, in a transaction valued at up to $840 million.

headline: What to Expect From Amgen's Q4 2025 Earnings Report
summary: Amgen will release its fourth-quarter earnings soon, and analysts anticipate a low double-digit profit dip.

headline: Zenas’ stock drops 51% despite lead asset’s Phase III rare disease win
summary: While obexelimab failed to best Uplizna in terms of efficacy, Zenas will still file for the drug’s approval in IgG4-RD.

raw.headline: Zenas’ stock drops 51% despite lead asset’s Phase III rare disease win
raw.summary: While obexelimab failed to best Uplizna in terms of efficacy, Zenas will still file for the drug’s approval in IgG4-RD.

headline: Amgen buys protein-degrading startup Dark Blue for up to $840M
summary: The deal hands Amgen a drug that destroys two proteins known to drive certain types of acute myeloid leukemia, a profile that could set it apart from current medications.

raw.headline: Amgen buys protein-degrading startup Dark Blue for up to $840M
raw.summary: The deal hands Amgen a drug that destroys two proteins known to drive certain types of acute myeloid leukemia, a profile that could set it apart from current medications.

headline: Zenas: Maintaining 'Strong Buy' As Cross-Trial Comparison Of Obexelimab Should Not Be A Factor
summary: Zenas BioPharma stays a Strong Buy after INDIGO phase 3 success for Obexelimab in IgG4-RD. Click here to read an analysis of ZBIO stock now.
